name: JesusSaid(BibleVersesfromJesusChrist)
0:
”Alexa, Jesus said”
”Alexa, open Jesus said”
”Alexa, start Jesus said”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jesus said
des: This Jesus Said skill features a large assortment of verses from Jesus in the Bible. Features verses from the books of Matthew, John, Luke, Mark, Revelation & more. In certain editions of the Holy Bible these would be also known as the "red text" which is believed to be the words spoken by Jesus. The verses within this skill were pulled from the King James version of the Bible. Take care! Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
